source: Credit rating based on S&P, Moody’s.
note: Numerical rating is obtained using the ratings scale in Jensen (2022) and as a simple average across ratings.

source: Based on IMF WEO, October 2023 and World Bank International Debt Statistics 2023.
note: Total debt refers to general government debt as reported by the IMF. External debt refers to public and publicly guaranteed debt as reported by the World Bank.

source: Based on IMF World Economic Outlook, October 2023
note: Net interests are calculated as the difference between the overall and primary balance.

source: World Bank IDS 2022 and IMF WEO October 2023
Based on World Bank International Debt Statistics 2023
note: Bilateral and multilateral debt equals total official creditor debt. Bonds plus ‘other private’ equals total private creditor debt.

source: Based on IMF World Economic Outlook, October 2023.
note: Net interests are calculated as the difference between the overall and primary balance.
